```{r plot 2}
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)

rstats_tweets <- readRDS(here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds"))
```

```{r}
# create new variable
rstats_tweets2 <- rstats_tweets %>%
  select(created_at) %>%
  mutate(months = lubridate::round_date(created_at, unit = "month")) 

# rough draft
rstats_tweets2 %>%
  count(months) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = months, y = n)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth() +
  scale_x_datetime(limits = as.POSIXct(c("2008-09-01 00:00:00","2018-12-12 00:00:00")))

# final

  
```
